statements: SELECT * FROM glucose_levels WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT glucose_level, recorded_time FROM glucose_levels WHERE patient_id = 2 ORDER BY recorded_time DESC;
SELECT AVG(glucose_level) AS average_glucose FROM glucose_levels WHERE patient_id = 3 GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(glucose_level) AS max_glucose FROM glucose_levels WHERE glucose_level > 150 GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM glucose_levels WHERE recorded_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM glucose_levels ORDER BY recorded_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(glucose_level) AS average_glucose FROM glucose_levels GROUP BY patient_id HAVING AVG(glucose_level) > 100;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(glucose_level) AS max_glucose, MIN(glucose_level) AS min_glucose FROM glucose_levels GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM glucose_levels WHERE glucose_level > 150 AND patient_id = 100 ORDER BY recorded_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients FROM glucose_levels;
SELECT * FROM patient_glucose WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY record_time DESC;
SELECT glucose_level, patient_id, record_time FROM patient_glucose WHERE glucose_level > 120;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(glucose_level) AS max_glucose FROM patient_glucose GROUP BY patient_id HAVING MAX(glucose_level) > 150;
SELECT * FROM device_info WHERE device_location LIKE '%hospital%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device_info WHERE device_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_glucose ORDER BY record_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(glucose_level) AS max_glucose FROM patient_glucose GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM device_info GROUP BY device_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_glucose WHERE glucose_level > 120 ORDER BY glucose_level DESC, record_time ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_location FROM device_info WHERE device_location LIKE '%lab%' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT MAX(glucose_level) AS max_glucose FROM glucose_levels;
SELECT patient_name, record_timestamp FROM patients JOIN glucose_levels ON patients.patient_id = glucose_levels.patient_id;
SELECT device_type, manufacturer, device_serial_number FROM devices ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN glucose_levels ON patients.patient_id = glucose_levels.patient_id ORDER BY patients.age DESC, glucose_levels.record_timestamp ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, glucose_level, record_timestamp FROM patients JOIN glucose_levels ON patients.patient_id = glucose_levels.patient_id WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT device_type, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Medtronic' AND device_type LIKE '%insulin%';
SELECT patient_name, age, glucose_level, record_timestamp FROM patients JOIN glucose_levels ON patients.patient_id = glucose_levels.patient_id ORDER BY glucose_level DESC, age ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age >= 50;
SELECT location, name FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, manufacturer FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'FEMALE' AND age > 30;
SELECT p.name, g.glucose_level, g.reading_time FROM patients p JOIN glucose_readings g ON p.patient_id = g.patient_id WHERE g.glucose_level > 150 ORDER BY g.reading_time DESC;
SELECT d.device_name, d.manufacturer, a.alert_type FROM devices d JOIN alerts a ON d.device_id = a.alert_id WHERE a.alert_type = 'HIGH_GLUCOSE' ORDER BY d.manufacturer;

SELECT p.name, g.glucose_level, a.description FROM patients p JOIN glucose_readings g ON p.patient_id = g.patient_id JOIN alerts a ON g.reading_id = a.reading_id WHERE p.location = 'New York' AND a.alert_type = 'LOW_GLUCOSE' ORDER BY p.name ASC, g.glucose_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT glucose_level, reading_timestamp FROM glucose_readings ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE location = 'Hospital';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT p.patient_name, g.glucose_level, l.location_name FROM patients p JOIN glucose_readings g ON p.patient_id = g.patient_id JOIN locations l ON g.patient_id = l.location_id WHERE g.glucose_level > 150 ORDER BY g.reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT d.device_name, d.manufacturer, l.latitude, l.longitude FROM devices d JOIN locations l ON d.location = l.location_id ORDER BY d.manufacturer ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT t.trend_id, p.patient_name, t.trend_type, t.trend_value FROM trends t JOIN patients p ON t.patient_id = p.patient_id ORDER BY t.trend_id DESC LIMIT 5
